titles.title: Social Security Payment Integrity and Information Act of 2022
Social Security Payment Integrity and Information Act of 2022
To amend title II of the Social Security Act relating to the sharing of death information with the Do Not Pay working system, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Social Security Payment Integrity and Information Act of 2022
This bill expands, for purposes of limiting improper federal payments, the Department of the Treasury's access to certain death records maintained by the Social Security Administration.
